title.jp: Hitome de Jinjou de Nai Mofumofu Da to Minuita yo

synopsis: Cocoa's first day at the Rabbit House Cafe is lively as she meets and becomes friends with Chino and Lize in a heartbeat, while also learning about her new friends' amazing talents.

title.jp: Komugi wo Aishita Shoujo to Azuki ni Aisareta Shoujo

synopsis: While getting ready for the first day of school, Cocoa runs into a new friend at the park. After introductions, Cocoa's new and old friends decide to bake bread and visit Chiya's coffee house.

title.jp: Hajimete Yotta Hi no Koto Oboeteru? Jibun no Ie de Campfire Shiyou to Shita wa yo ne

synopsis: While out shopping for new mugs, Cocoa and company run into a new friend, Sharo. Afterwards, they enjoy some tea at Sharo's teahouse and spend the night at Rabbit house telling scary stories.

title.jp: Lucky Item wa Yasai to Tsumi to Batsu

synopsis: Chino is worried about her height, and actively attempts to grow using less than verified methods. Cocoa practices her fortune telling technique using caffe-de-mancy, and the girls head to the library on a sunny afternoon.
The girls begin practicing for the ball sports tournament at school, with unsurprising results. Father's Day is coming up, and Rize takes up extra jobs to get something special for her father.
Cocoa and Chino go out for a walk around town on their day off. Later, Chino's friends help out at the Rabbit House and take a shining to Cocoa and Lize, leaving Chino the odd man out.
Chino and Cocoa get into small, cute fights with each other over puzzles and pancakes. Later, the girls hand out flyers for their cafes.

title.jp: Pool ni Nurete Ame ni Nurete Namida ni Nurete

synopsis: The girls head off to a hot spring for a relaxing break.
Chino's grandfather's backstory is revealed, and Rize is chosen as the lead in the school prouction of the Phantom of the Opera.

title.jp: Tai Onee-chan You Kessen Butai, Tsuushou Chimame-tai

synopsis: While Cocoa helps Chiya study for the upcoming exams, Megu and Maya help our at Rabbit House. Later, a trip to the pool is in order.

title.jp: Shoujo wa Akai Gaitou wo Matoi Usagi wo Karite Seiya no Sora wo Iku

synopsis: To celebrate the Christmas season, the girls decide to throw a Christmas party. Let the planning commence!
Cocoa runs a fever and the girls head out to get her some feel better medicine.
